markdownRemark.html:
Hi, I'm Mishal Shah, pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science at NITK, Surathkal, India. I love software development and interested in Networks, Databases, Web Security.

In the past, I have interned at IIIT Hyderabad in 2018, been Google Summer of Code Student in 2019 and served as a mentor in Google Code-in '19 with the ns-3 Organization.

I have attend some hackathons (Smart India Hackathon 2018, code.fun.do, InOut 6.0), love helping the community, reading engineering articles of various companies and try to learn about the Internet.

I'm a hard-working, enthusiastic, passionate developer and love to contribute to the community. At college, I'm part of various community groups: IE NITK (a technical club), WebClub NITK (a computer science club), IRIS NITK (a student-led online portal for all procedures) and lead organized a National Level Hackathon - HackVerse.

I love playing basketball, eating different dishes and visiting different places.
